name: Beats Pill - Portable Bluetooth Speaker
pros: Excellent sound quality with deep bass
Long battery life with phone charging capability
Compact and portable with included lanyard
cons: Bass can overwhelm mids at higher volumes
description: The Beats Pill delivers powerful, room-filling sound with up to 24 hours of battery life. Featuring a custom racetrack woofer for 90% more air displacement, IP67 water and dust resistance, and seamless Apple/Android compatibility. Includes stereo pairing, USB-C lossless audio support, and can even charge your devices. Perfect for home, travel, and outdoor use with premium sound quality.
